_comment: Slow configuration with subtree crossover and random mutation
_comment_profile: Thorough exploration with balanced operators - subtree crossover maintains structural integrity while random mutation adaptively selects optimal mutation strategies for diverse exploration

_comment_crossover_descriptions.subtree: Standard GP subtree crossover - exchanges subtrees between parents

_comment_mutation_descriptions.random: Randomly selects between different mutation types (subtree, node, constant, or function mutation)

_comment_performance_notes.max_depth: Increased to 8 for complex expression evolution
_comment_performance_notes.population_size: Large population for extensive exploration and diversity maintenance
_comment_performance_notes.max_generations: Many generations for thorough convergence and optimization
_comment_performance_notes.tournament_size: Increased to 5 for stronger selection pressure with high exploration
_comment_performance_notes.mutation_prob: Higher mutation rate to leverage random mutation strategy diversity
_comment_performance_notes.balanced_approach: Subtree crossover provides structural recombination while random mutation ensures adaptive exploration
_comment_performance_notes.exploration_depth: Configuration designed for comprehensive search with intelligent mutation adaptation
